summary: Provides client-side implementations of the NSPI (Name Service Provider Interface) DCE/RPC protocol used by Microsoft Exchange address book services, including data structures, error handling, and helper functions for binding, querying, resolving, and manipulating directory entries.
business_intent: Facilitates interaction with Exchange address book servers for enumeration, lookup, and management of directory objects, supporting security testing, forensic analysis, and automation of MAPI/Exchange operations.
